name: Documentmarkdown
body:
### Home

Deployment & Automation is a central service which provide information about the deployment and automation work for the projects:
PHIX
WEM
BILLING
Requesting test automation for a specific project

Raise a Ticket at below give link While raising a ticket, Please include following:
Project details
SVN location for deployment.
Server or hostname details.
SVN revision numbers.
Attach verified release notes in a pre defined format.
Miscellaneous Links
Jenkins - https://build.demo.hcentive.com/jenkins/
Portal - https://build.demo.hcentive.com/portal/
Phabricator - https://phabricator.demo.hcentive.com/

To create a ticket for deployment follow the below link

https://hcentive.jira.com/browse/ENGOPS/?selectedTab=com.atlassian.jira.jira-projects-plugin:issues-panel
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
